use_cases: ["Genome sequencing using Illumina HiSeq 2000 platform to generate 16,059,176 paired-end reads", "Genome assembly using Velvet assembler v1.1.02 to produce 109 contigs", "Gene prediction using Glimmer 3.02 to identify 3,225 protein-coding genes", "tRNA prediction using ARAGORN to identify 53 tRNA genes", "rRNA prediction using RNAmmer to identify 3 rRNA genes", "Functional annotation of predicted genes using BLASTp against NR database", "Comparative genome analysis with Gluconobacter oxydans 621H to identify unique genes", "Identification of paralogous sldAB operons for dihydroxyacetone production", "Deposition of draft genome sequence to DDBJ/EMBL/GenBank under accession BAON00000000"]
